summary: This bill, the "Representing our Seniors at VA Act of 2025," aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code concerning veterans' affairs. It mandates the inclusion of a representative from the National Association of State Veterans Homes on the Department of Veterans Affairs' Geriatrics and Gerontology Advisory Committee. This addition, in consultation with the Association's president, seeks to provide specialized expertise on nursing home administration, improving the committee's capacity to address the needs of elderly veterans.
